values:
yesterday was my 19th birthday! 
Jeff brought me out to circuit city and bought a new head unit for my car. Then later on, mom, dad, kel, jeff, lisa and jeff and I went to tgi fridays for dinner. 

today was relatively calm, jeff and I brought spots and princess to the mead for a bit. after dropping them off at home we ran a few arrands.
jeff and I were going to go to olive garden for dinner, but he was called into work. so now I am watching alias on TNT.

wow, I havent wrote in this thing in AGES! I was reading through some friends' ljs and decided to crack this thing open, let the bats fly out and write something. 
What is new in my life? 
   Well, I turn 19 on wednesday!! woohoo
And my rsd is almost completely gone!!! My doctor is a miracle worker. Because of him, I dont have to go out to minnesota to the mayo clinic. I'm down from 10+ vicodin to one or two. It's such a great feeling being able to do things now. I'm not 100% better.. there are still somethings that bother it, like blow drying my hair, having it raised too long, stuff like that. But im not complaining. I havent been this happy in so long. Well except for when I met jeff.

Jeff. He's a year above me, and went to FHS. He was captain of the hockey team. I met him after I graduated at the kennel, where i work, on brickyard. 

well , I'm going to have to finish this later because i am going out with jen (hodge)

au revoir =o)

yesterday was an absolutly b-e-a-utiful day. And I got my first ride on a harley! My cousine Debbie took me out. It was amazing, I loved it. 

Then today, I wasn't feeling too hot so I went home early and just slept. I felt better when I wokeup though. ThenI brought the cox boxes to practice, and I didn't want to stay at the mead so I decided to go hang out with the boys practice and talked with Jesse a bunch.

right now I am at CCSU helping my sis. Im spending the night here. I have to help her draw some stuff. She says we'll probably be up until like 3 in the morning, but thats alright.

Im so sick of school. I can't wait to get out of here. I'm sick of the people at school. I just want to meet new people who arent immature and wont harass me about  my RSD, like the people in this hell hole.

I miss hayley so much.. I wish Matt wasn;t being such an ass about this whole thing.. *sigh...* :( such a bummer..

I need to go draw now..

au revoir

♥♥

I have a big assessment in english tomorrow. And I, being the genius I am, left everything in my locker. I needed to finish reading the damn book. grrrr... So, I've got to go to school early tomorrow. Joyous

I'm freezing cold. brrrrrr

my grade in forensics is 100 =o)

"Sleeping Beauty
Poisoned and hopeless
You're far beyond a visible sign of your awakening
Failing miserably to find a way to comfort you" 
~A perfect circle

so extremly bored. and very, very, very sore.I don't think I'll be sleeping that good tonite, if I do managed to fall asleep. Blahhhh.. I should go downstairs and take my neurontin before I forget.

mehhh...

I'm so unbelievably sore from that doctor's appointment today. Argh. And my neck is super stiff x12039743586. It kills

I've missed so much school because of doctor appointments. Especially math. I don't understand what we're doing and there was a test on the stuff on friday. So I'm screwed. 

saturday night I'm going down to coventry to go to my aunts house. we're opening christmas presents. And then sunday, it's christmas for me and my family. 

blahhhh... I feel sick from the dinner I ate.

<font color="blue">I really should be sleeping right now, since i have to get up at 4:30. But I'm anything but tired. And my shoulder hurts. It was bothering me last night and I kept tossing and turning. I'm bringing my pillow in the car with me tomorrow morning, and going to attempt to fall asleep. But usally once I'm up and showered, or atleast up, I can't fall asleep. Maybe this time will be different. I need to find my disc man, my dads going to use the GPS talking navigation. that voice annoys the hell out of me. I'm missing all of school tomorrow. And then I have another doctors appointment at 3. After that I'm going back to school though to practice. So I can let Dr B know about what was said/done/wants to be done. And of course tell Chris. My neck is quite stiff. It needs to be stretched out desperatly.Maybe I'll just go in my room and watch a movie. 

I'm really nervous about tomorrow. I need to stop. I'm going to make myself sick I'm worrying so much. 

/♥/au revoir </font>

I had two doctors appointments today. And  I have to go up to the Lahey Medical Clinic in Boston tomorrow. It's about a 2 1/2 hour drive, so we've got to be out of the house by 5:30. That means I have to get up at like 4:30/4:45. Joyous. Hopefully I won't need any needles. I'm sore from the cold weather. I can't wait til florida. I can't wait to get away from people. Mainly the people that still continue to mock me and talk crap about my arm and say I'm making excuses for everything. What part of stop don't they understand. Whatever..karma.. what comes around goes around. 

I wanted to see Chris today after my doctors appointments to tell him what was said, and since I won't be in school tomorrow. Plus I'm really scared. But that didn't happen. I wish I could put him in a suitcase and bring him with me to Florida. 

I'm cold. brrrrr

Kels sick, I hope see feels better. I got my acceptence letter from CCSU yesterday. Go me.

hmmm...I need to warm up and go get stuff out of my car. 

au revoir /♥/

The truth is...
you could slit my throat 
and with my last gasping breath
I'd apologize for bleeding on your shirt

-Taking Back Sunday

I need to go down to coventry today to give my aunt the panera bread coupons she ordered, and theres an old cemetary where Nathan Hale's tombstone is, or its a memorial. I'm not exactly sure. But, nonetheless I want to take pictures of it. But I don't want to go alone. 

I've been up since 8:30. I should shower. I'm quite comfy though, sweatpants and a long sleeved t-shirt. A week til "christmas". Im excited about going down to florida, but scared at the same time. i hate hearing about all these problems with the planes (crashing etc) it scares the hell out of me. I don't want to fly down. 

My bird is squawking its head off. 

Doctor appointment tomorrow. missing math again, and possibly a portion of photo.  So technically I don't need to get my photo project done fortomorrow, but I want to. 

I need to put my contacts in

//au revoir

Went to a portion of the basketball game with chris last night, then we went out to dinner with my parents. Afterwards we came back to my house and watched Lord of the rings because it was on tv.

 A lot of people at school are sick or starting to get sick. I'm starting to get sick and my moms loading me up on cold stuff to make that not happen. My head hurts, but this time its not from stress. 

we got a new car. A nissan murano. I get to take it after 3 today.

My arm hurts. 

I'm so sick of people. No, let me rephrase that, a certain group of people at my school. I have Reflex Sympathetic Dystrophy (RSD). I am <font size="6"> NOT </font> making this up. Many of you, have NEVER asked me anything about this. None of you have ever even looked up things. Why don't you ask me about it instead of mocking me. You have absolutly no right to say that I am faking this. You have no idea what it is like to live with RSD. The constant throbbing pain, the feeling of your hand being on fire, someone scrapping your bones out with a spoon, a jagged nail through your shoulder, and everything else I feel. Or to lose function in your arm for a day, few days, a week, etc. You have no idea of the torture I go through. The countless Stellate Ganglion Blocks (needle)in the front of my neck, and the epideral needle I got in the back of my neck, where I could hear my cartilidge rip. And let me tell you, it wasn't pretty. Or the EMG where they SHOCKED my nerves. None of you have the right to saw I am faking. Just because you can't see it , like a broken arm with a cast, doesn't mean I'm faking it. <font size="5">We are in HIGH SCHOOL. Not middle school. Grow the fuck up.</font>




"...she's angry at the world
Emergency, call 911
She's pissed off at everyone"

I left shool at 10:30 today. My head was pounding and I just felt really crummy. So I slept for about 2 and 1/2 hours before my MRI. The MRI was alrite I guess. I had to get dye injected into my good arm. I could feel coldness going up my arm as it spread. It fell out of my arm, the first time because my arm twitched, so they had to put it in my hand. That hurt. They gave me sesame street bandaids. 

my throat was bothering me earlier, it still is, but not that bad.

I wanted to go see Chris after my MRI, but that didn't end up happening =( Hopefully I can spend time with him this weekend.

and I'm supposed to be finishing my ghost story, but that's not happening. I'm going to attempt to get as much of it done tonight as possible, and finish it in 2nd, 4th, 5th and 7th period and just give it to her after school. I just have to find out what tiem she will be after til. 

Manda's birthday dinner is tomorrow night. But I have no money, so I dont see the point of me going. I mean I want to, but it would be kind of stupid for me to go to a restaurant and not eat.  And then Amanda wants me to help her keep score at the jv basketball game which starts t 5:30. I might I don't know. Depends how I feel. Hopefully I won't have an awful head ache tomorrow. I have to remember to bring in fake flowers, 4 paper plates, forks, napkins, knives and cups for out skit in Psych. We're doing a project for defense mechanisms. The setting is in a restaurant, I'm representing denial, so I'm this big huge druggy/drunk. Steph is compensation, Andrew is Identification and Alicia is day dreaming/fantasy. Should be fun. But I get really shy presenting things in front of people. Unless I know them. And I really don't know the people in my psych class except for a few people, like Kim. 

My parents are picking up the murano tomorrow. I get to drive it to school on monday. and another day when my car goes into the shop to get new tires.

ok I reallllly need to finish that ghost story.  and maybe look for some info on the JFK assassination for forensics after.

♥

the reasons why you're so beautiful. by larsiepan
your name
your eyes are...wreathed in beautiful dark lashes
your lips are...plump and pouty
your face is...sculpted by the gods
your body is...truly a work of art
your hips are...firm and buff
your smile is...simply gorgeous
your hair is...often mistaken as silk
your love is...unrequited
Quiz created with MemeGen!

we have an hour delay today. =) that makes me happy. Except my parents never told me..so good thing christopher did otherwise I'd be waiting at the school wondering where the hell everyone was..hehe.

I keep getting headaches. I think it's because I'm stressed out. Who knows. 

mmmmm apple juice.

I need to get my camera and charge the batteries for a bit. I also need to dry my hair. I had it in pigtails last night, for some unknown reason, but it looked cute. I need to feed my fishy.

I got a lot of slepe last night. I want into my room around 9:30 and laid down in bed and watched tv, and I kept drifting in and out of sleep. It wasn't good sleep though. I kept laying on my bad arm so when I woke up everytime, it hurt more.

time to go finish getting ready for school. 

tada. the end.

I need to take a lot of pictures. I'm sick of seeing my photo board empty. Maybe I'll bring my camera to school tomorrow. I have physical therapy tomorrow. I think Jen might come with me because my mom is supposed to try to fix her hair so it's all one colour tomorrow after work. And jen doesn't have a car tomorrow. I have loads and loads of doctor appointments all this week and next week. a hole sleigh full. Its insane. There's a few I'm really scared for, but oh well, suck it up. at some point, I'm going to see the surgeon who operated on my dad, for his anyurism (spelling), and some doctor who is i guess one of the best doctors out of the 50 in some area. I dunno, I forget. I should be working on my ghost story. But i dont want to type it up. I rather say it to someone and type it up. I can always say things better then writing them. ....pic-a-tures.... sara on halloween night! sara and ash at illusions on halloween! sara and me, aren't we gorgeous tada. the end.

I just found this, through some random thing on livejournal, and I'm bored so why not?


Step One

- Make a post (public, friendslocked, filtered...whatever you're comfortable with) to your LJ. The post should contain your list of 10 holiday wishes. The wishes can be anything at all, from simple and fandom-related ("I'd love a Snape/Hermione icon that's just for me") to medium ("I wish for _____ on DVD") to really big ("All I want for Christmas is a new car/computer/house/TV.") The important thing is, make sure these wishes are things you really, truly want.

- If you wish for real life things (not fics or icons), make sure you include some sort of contact info in your post, whether it's your address or just your email address where Santa (or one of his elves) could get in touch with you.

- Also, make sure you post some version of these guidelines in your LJ, or link to this post (it'll be public) so that the holiday joy will spread.

Step Two 

- Surf around your friendslist (or friendsfriends, or just random journals) to see who has posted their list. And now here's the important part:

- If you see a wish you can grant, and it's in your heart to do so, make someone's wish come true. Sometimes someone's trash is another's treasure, and if you have a leather jacket you don't want or a gift certificate you won't use--or even know where you could get someone's dream purebred Basset Hound for free--do it.

You needn't spend money on these wishes unless you want to. The point isn't to put people out, it's to provide everyone a chance to be someone else's holiday elf--to spread the joy. Gifts can be made anonymously or not--it's your call.

There are no rules with this project, no guarantees, and no strings attached. Just...wish, and it might come true. Give, and you might receive. And you'll have the joy of knowing you made someone's holiday special.



<font size="4">My wish list</font>(no perticular order)
01. star stuff
02. gift certificate to blue moon to buy pretty jewelry.
03. stuffed animal(s)
04. snowflake necklace
05. Charmed DVD seasons box sets (there is 7 in total)
06. a pigmy goat =)
07. a cure
08. A cd, any one. a mix preferably.
09. hand kint/made scarf
10. harry potter movies (im a loser hehe)

yesterday was amazing. I spent over 9 hours with Chris. We went to the meridan mall to go shopping and got a few christmas gifts. Then we thought of something to get Eric, and went to westfarms, but they didnt have it. Hopefully they get it in soon. Then we went back to my house and waited for my moms christmas party to start. I was really dizzy though, so we just stayed on the couch for a bit. then people finally started arriving around 7ish. Then at somepoint Kel, Sam, Val, Chris and I started to play disney monopoly, and my mom and her friends were playing some game where a bunch of words sounded like a real one, like, yell opa chess (yello pages) it was something like that. they were so loud. every time they would scream and cheer,we would do the same thing and say opa really loud. But we got bored of the game, Chris won, and then Sara and Ash got there. After they left me and chris went into the living room and turned off the lights so the xmas tree illuminated the room and we fell asleep on the couch . But then he couldnt fall back to sleep after my mom and sis woke us up to ask us where a game was. Apparently my body was twitching a lot. He's comfy. I haven't slept that good in so long. He was running his fingers through my hair and I passed out

I kept waking up this morning and going back to sleep. I woke up at 8, then again at 9:15, then at 10:37 and then finally at 11 I got out of bed and jsut sat in my room.

oops, i forgot to feed my fishy.hes cute, when you pick up the fish food, he'll start swimming wicked fast around and around his bowl. Silly fish.

////supposed to be working on my ghost story, but I dont have the energy to write it, and my elbows a bit sore. supposed to get snow tomorrow and freezing rain at night.

I'm in the mood to wrap the christmas gifts I got yesterday. I still need to get my brothers and another one for someone. I should look on ebay.


ok welll time to go search ebay for random things.

tada. the end.

Went to the movies last night with Jen, her boyfriend Ian and his friend Jeremy, Signa, Mindy, Sarah and Courtney. We saw the Grudge. Holy shit. I heard that movie got horrible reviews and wasnt scary at all, we were screaming! And the guys were laughing at us! Me and Signa had our hoods up and kept pulling the neck part where the strings are above our eyes, Mindy saw it so she wasnt phased, Jen was hiding under her hoodie, plugging her ears lol, and courtney latched onto sarahs arm. We were laughing our asses off during the previews, We were probably those obnoxious teenagers you wanna kill at the movies lol. That movie was so weird and creepy!! We went back to Jens house adn watched hucules =)

I need medication, my arm hurts. Physical therapy on tuesday, 3:30.i have my MRI thursday at 2:30, some doctors appointment up in boston at some point, a doctor appt with dr bluth on the 22nd. WHo knows what else. I know its all before the 23rd, thats when I leave for florida.

I'm bored. I need to do my christmas shopping. Chris is cleaning. he's slow. blahhh boredom. 

Chris, Sara and Ashley are coming to the xmas party tonite. excellente.

i'm so sick of hurting. I'm sick of the crying. and most importantly, i hate not being able to do the things i usd to be able to do.

i wish it would just go away. im sick of being miserable.

i supposed my appointment with the neuro surgeon went alright. except for a few idiotic remarks he made, freakin genius. He says its not in my neck, so no neck surgery =D. He thinks maybe it's my brachial plexus so he's going to have me get another MRI. What is this, number 8 or 9? Maybe 10? Its still hurts when I take deep breaths. And my arm still feels weak. It hurts to type with this hand. So  I'll resort to typing with one. Amanda was so sad today, I felt horrible for her, along with everyone else. And ryan, I didn't even read your damn livejournal, Amanda told me. And when we do talk about what you wrote, SHE'S ALREADY READ IT. 

I need to work on my ghost story. i got an extension. shes very leniant with me. I appreciate it. 

i need medicines.

today wasn't fun. my arm was killing me. i cried a lot. it still hurts. i'm cold on top of that so is making it worse. 

i should eat some dinner, but i have no appetite. i ate a lot at lunch. well, a lot for me that is.

i'm scared about tomorrow. i feel my eyes begin to burn and fill up with tears everytime i think about it. i had a conversation about it with him. he was saying he wouldn't do anything that would hurt me, but the only problem is, we don't know if it will make things worse til its too late. apparently the surgeon I'm going to knows about the same amount on rsd as dr kost does. scared.. nervous. 

lonely.

crying yet again. i feel so weak.

i hate this. i hate this. i hate this. i hate this. i hate this. i hate this. i hate this. i hate this. i hate this. i hate this. i hate this. i hate this. i hate this. i hate this. i hate this. i hate this. 
why can't I fall asleep. 
I just want to sleep.
I wish for once I had someone to talk to until I got tired, instead of sitting here all alone. 
my arm freaking hurts. 
=(

I hate college crap. In the words of Jen: Laziness, my ally and worst enemy. I'm working on another essay , but I'm just too stressed out. i have too much going on this week/end. I need a good weekend. I'm scared about thursday. really scared. And I know I shouldn't be, but I don't know whats going to happen at this meeting. I get really nervous just thinking about it. The anxiety kills me. It's like the whole needles/procedure. Say the word needle or let me think about it and I'll start crying. I'm pathetic.

SATs saturday. Hopefully hanging out with Chris afterwards since I can't see him friday. We're supposed to go to the mall and go xmas shopping. 

I'm so nervous and stressing out over so much that I'm making myself sick to my stomach. I felt sick allll day long. 

i need to stop.

♥chris won't be in school tomorrow..i hope tomororw is better than today... =/

tada. the end.

most people are sleeping right now. but nooooo not jessica. jessica can't be normal and actually fall asleep at a decent time. I went to bed around 2:30 last night. Probably going to be the same thing tonite. I've got this awful sharp throbbing pain in my shoulder. I'm so sick of this shit. I wish it would end. my arm needs to stop fucking hurting. Why can't there be someone else who cant sleep, so I can actually talk to someone and not ramble on and on in this. grrrr yahoo is amusing. for the last who knows how long, chris and I have been drawing pictures to each other through yahoo messenger. we're losers. but we get to be losers together. i have to write my ghost story this week in school. its due on the 6th. 2 day before that is SATs and 2 days before that is my appointment with the spinal surgeon. Holy birdcages batman, I have a feeling next week is going to be hell. i'm already getting nervous. and paranoid. not good =/ "And shepherds we shall be, for thee my lord for thee. Power hath decended forth from thy hand so our feet may swiftly carry out thy command. And we shall flow a river forth to thee and teeming with souls shall it ever be. In nomine Patris, et Filii, et Spiritus Sancti." boondock saints. go watch it. mehhhh. bored. in pain. cold as hell. peachy, just peachy.

i don't want to go to school tomorrow.
i've got an awful headache.
and i'm sad. 
blaahhhh .

marcs bday party was tonite = fun. we watched the boon dock saints, need to finish it. i like it.
hanging out at the gold roc diner with chris, cait, steph and steve = fun.

my neck and shoulder is stiff. blahhh.
chris is still up =) i missed him today. but i got a nice email from him. =) =)
shopping at westbrook tomorrow. hopefully i can get alll my xmas shopping done.

slightly tired.

I got woken up by Hayley this morning at 8. and played with her for a few hours. 

Then I went to the mall and I was walkign along and I'm looking and I see this person and I just kind of stop walking and start staring, and they do the same. It was Jen!! We're such losers, at the mall by ourselves hehe.So we walked around, did some shopping. She found something for amanda's bday/xmas gift. I didn't find anything yet.  I'm going to the westbrook outlets tomorrow so hopefully I can get my xmas shopping done. but I'm not sure what exactly people want. Or who's buying me things. I hate when people buy me things and I don't have something for them. I feel bad. For a few people I'm getting them things while I'm down in Florida. 

so I'm bored. I have nothing to do. Marc's party isn't until 6:30. Jen and I wanted to buy him some gag gifts, but we don't have a Spencers at our mall, crummy thing. So we sort of got him a gag gift. It's amusing, well, atleast to us because we're losers. I need to return the movie chris and I watched yesterday. I want to hang out with him too. 

All I hear is hayley running down stairs going, doggy doggy doggy!!  Crazy child.

tada. the end.

i spent 9 hours with chris yesterday. it was <font size="4"> amazing</font>
we watched most of shrek 2, then went to blockbuster and rented the day after tomorrow. that was good, i enjoyed it.  and we looked at old pictures in my room. i had fun, minus all of the tickling.. 

now time for a message form hayley:
  nv v v c


hhhhm yyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy              x             sfgsfh 451535;kj  j ;';.f';.sfd'.df21 454    j01-k,b,rt5rtbv b bn 

tada. the end.

i need to get a gift for marc. i dont know what to get him,. maybe I'll just give him money.

time to go play with hayley.

school was alrite today. It went by fast. I only had one out of the two tests I was supposed to. I think I did alright on the psych, except I left 2 fill-ins blank. Oh well..

I hate this crappy ass weather. It makes my arm hurt so much. Then I get into such a crummy mood. I'm miserable right now.

I'm tired. I fell asleep around 3:45/4 am. I was so bored, cold and lonely.

college kids came to school today. I saw Ross, Josh, John Carrey, Melissa, Amy, Amy, Luren, Caitie, Ryan, Julie, Danny, Bailey, and a few others, I can't remember who else.

maybe i'll go lay down.

mehh.

<marquee><font size="6"><font color="red">BORED!</marquee></font></font>

i just burned a cd. And I've got this awful pain in my shoulder. It's kind of hard to breath because of it. I wish Chris was up. I'm bored (obviously if you didn't quite catch that from above^) and lonely.

<font size="4">I've got a headache</font>

I just found my henna stuff.. maybe I'll do a design.

I'm so mad my star and cresent moon ring broke. It's quite upsetting. Yes so I'm getting to the point where I want to rip my arm out of the socket. I'm getting so frustrated that I can't sleep. Last time this happened, I ripped out hair. I need more stuff to do besides ramble on and on incoherently in this. It helps pass time and all, but I'm still lonely and bored. Everyone is asleep, with an away up. My eyes are starting to go crazy again. It feels like they are bouncing around in my eyeball holder area. What ever that thing is called.

I'm going to go look for a henna design. That will help pass time.

<font size="5"><font color="blue">Au Revoir</font>
<font color="red">♥</font>

i wish i could sleep. right now.
i wish my shoulder didn't hurt.
scratch that. i wish i never got rsd.
i wish i didn't get sad for no apparent reason. its dumb.
i could use a hug right about now.
i have two tests tomorrow. most excellent. i left my psych stuff in my locker. way to go jessica. i have my forensics, but i'm not in the mood to study, not in the mood to do anything except crawl into my bed and curl up into a ball.


blah..

mehhh...
my shoulder hurts.
and i don't think i'll be getting much sleep tonite. I shouldn't have slept that much earlier.
*le sigh
i'm sad, not sure why .
tonite is going to be a long night.

so i just got bitched at because our fake tree is falling apart. my shoulder fucking kills and my dad was screaming at me to fix it. you know im sorry you are frustrated and everything, but dont fucking take it out on me. i've got my own problems. i dont need this. im stressed out enough as it is.

went home sick today.
blaahhhh.
i kept having really bad hot and cold flashes, and i was nauseaus.
so i went home and slept, until I was woken up by a test message from chris, who was also home sick. then i went back to sleep. i slept for almost 5 hours, it was nice. i just hope i can sleep tonight.

my physical therapist told me not to get surgery. my dad thinks it will help. i hate this.

i hate talking about my arm when im sick or in pain. i get really aggrivated.

im tired. my elbow hurts. i need my medicine. 

i want to get off the phone. im miserable.  blah blah blah.......

i just finished watching CSI.
My neck is very stiff, and my arm is sore. I have physical therapy at 4 tomorrow. I hope Chris can come. I wonder how if he's still sleeping. headaches are horrible. I hope he feels better.

hartford is the 7th dangerous city in america...oh now isnt that pleasant?? I just heard that on the news.

i'm a bit tired.

maybe I'll try go get some sleep.

♥

[school] was alright I guess. Took an IQ test during 2nd period for some extra credit in my psych class. Too bad they are all fake. I got 118, making me gifted. Chris took it and got a 130 making him a genius (yeah ok..got the right person?? =p lol just kidding baby♥) I was a little dizzy after 4th period, from my medicine my guess. Psych was amusing. Forensics was interesting, we're doing a thing on the kennedy assassination.

{after school} i stayed after with chris and amanda. chris had to go get help with bio, and I went with Amanda to her LAX meeting. I wouldn't mind managing LAX, but i don't think I could manage two teams. Too bad it wasn't a winter sport. You Know You're From Connecticut When...
You have hiked up a big hill or small mountain at least once for a keg party. You never went to a bar in high school. You thought that the only highways were 91 and 84. You thought everyone couldn't buy beer after 8 pm You actually thought that Hartford was big You or someone you know has attended UCONN You drive a JETTA You still think that the Whalers are cool. You have been to Misquamicut and to that little hot dog place. There is a farm within miles of your house You thought bars were really for people over 21 Your high school thanksgiving football game was the highlight of your school year. You don't have an accent when you talk You have known at least 2 preppy rich kids from Fairfield who listen to Phish. You love Hilton Kaderli and your mom cried when he retired. UConn basketball rules and no one can tell you different You have deer in your backyard. You didn't drink or do drugs until 10th grade. You still don't understand why people say that Connecticut is the richest state..... Your best friend went to Central, Western, Eastern and finally Manchester Community College. Your mom works at Travelers and your dad works at Pratt and Whitney. You have been drunk at the Meadows and don't remember the concert. You go to Riverside at least once a summer Your parents actually care about the Governor, the Patriots coming to Hartford, the lights at Christmas in Hartford & Channel 3 news. You have a UCONN flag outside of your house year round You think New Jersey was a toxic waste dump You hang out at Denny's You've partied at bonfires You have at least one friend with a pickup You think everyone works tobacco in the summer You think Old Lyme is a shore town You've been to Cape Cod You think the Connecticut River is endless The town diner is the only place open after midnight. You have at least 4 friends who drive Jeep Grand Cherokees You root for all the New York sports teams If anybody asks, you're from just outside of New York. You've never looked at a public bus schedule You have both girlfriends and guyfriends with the same name as you. You go to the diner late night to post party. You think New Haven is the worst ghetto you've ever seen You can proudly tell an outsider about Nutmeg. You weekend either on the Cape or Rhode Island at a summer home You have said... " I'm in a good location... Between both Boston and New York." You can carry on a conversation about Mike Liut, Torrie Robertson, and the Brass Bonanza. You have to explain Cow Tipping to people from out of state. When you go to a real city, you sincerely feel bad for every poor / homeless person you see. You get pissed at anyone who doesn't know how to drive in the snow. You can name all the members of the UCONN men's and women's basketball teams. You still can't find your way in Hartford (except for that bar area near Union Station.) You hold the door open for someone and they don't say "Thank You." You own a golden or a lab (used to...) You own real Oakley's You only know Westbrook and Clinton because they have good outlets You don't think you're a yuppie, but the rest of the country does You only ski in Vermont or out West Your mother is the head of the PTA There is absolutely nothing to do in the winter You live twenty minutes form either an Abercrombie & Fitch, J. Crew, or GAP. You sail, or know someone who does. You don't understand why everyone else has not been to Europe. You can't get through the week with out a Coffee Coolata Your family owns more cars than legal drivers School attire is a North Face fleece jacket, a North Face Fleece or L.L. Bean back pack, a plaid shirt, khakis, and Doc Martins. Summer footwear is either Reefs or Birks You carry your keys on a carabineer, but you don't know how to rock climb. You feel for the homeless, but are not willing to give up the golf course land to develop a homeless shelter. As a child you took horseback riding, golfing, tennis and swimming lessons. You grew up wanting to be a lifeguard You own every DMB CD The state is so small you know where all the speed traps are You can't understand why people don't understand what your talking about when you refer to a "package" store You went to prep school even though your public schools are awesome People actually wear sweaters around their necks You've never taken public transportation You know of at least one person who's house was totally trashed after a huge party Your mom drives a Volvo wagon You have at least one friend whose house was built in the 1800's You live in a huge colonial You know at LEAST one person who has been pulled over and found to have weed in their car The only overcrowding is of deer in your backyard Your house would cost half as much in any other state Your wardrobe contains at least three pairs of cords and five wool sweaters Half of your friends are from another town because yours is so small At least one of your friends has a sick house right on the water You actually get these jokes and pass them on to other friends from Connecticut.
